name: Car 3D Simulator Driving
description:
Drive on the highway overtaking hard car traffic Simulator!
Here is the excellent Car Simulator game!

Rainy, smoggy, snowy weather moods. Have an excellent experience!

Game Features
- Realistic car driving experience
- Perfect HD graphics
- 6 different car (Sport car, classical car, race car, mini car)
- Real car sounds
- 8 different cam angle. Inside cam, outside cam, front cam and even more
- Realistic steering wheel ( Each wheel is designed special for a car. Every car has a different driving.)
- Perfect car physic and car simulation
- Different weather conditions ( Rainy, snowy, smoggy, cloudy, special weather conditions)
- Drive on the highway
- Traffic Racer Mode

Brace yourself to fun with the newest, unique car Simulator game of 2014.
publishers: ZUUKS BILISIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
